item.title: Trump’s handling of the economy is at its lowest point in AP-NORC polling
item.description: A new AP-NORC poll finds President Donald Trump’s approval on the economy has fallen substantially since he reentered the White House.

item.title: Washington state under emergency as torrential rain triggers floods, mudslides and evacuations
The Senate is set to vote on 2 rival health plans. Here’s what’s at stake for Americans
